sentences.en: Be readyto pounce on ill - advised decisions , poor judgment and bad timing.
sentences.cn: 做好功课,远离错误的建议 、 失误的判断和糟糕的时机.

sentences.en: But aren't deviant adults also ready to pounce?
sentences.cn: 但不是思想有偏差的成人也准备反扑 么 ?

sentences.en: He hovered round, waiting to pounce again.
sentences.cn: 他徘徊着, 等待再一次的猛扑.

sentences.en: Improved Pounce? Removed and replaced by the new talent Primal Resilience.
sentences.cn: 强化突袭 - 删除被新天赋原始恢复取代.

sentences.en: Local politicians are quick to pounce on any trouble.
sentences.cn: 地方上的那些政客们动辄抓住问题不放.

sentences.en: One cough or wrong move, and the comedian will pounce.
sentences.cn: 你的任何行为----咳嗽或错误的举动, 都可能引起演员的注意.

sentences.en: Perhaps they can pounce before the mouse disappears.
sentences.cn: 或许他们能够在老鼠绝迹之前,就先给予迎头痛击.

sentences.en: The cat was hiding in the bushes, ready to pounce.

sentences.en: The lion crouched ready to pounce.
This is the kind of careless mistake on which examiners love pounce.

sentences.en: Why do you pounce on every single thing I say?

trans.tran_en: the act of pouncing; a spring or swoop
to suddenly move forward and attack someone or something, after waiting to attack them
